The new updates on this game have been nothing short of a great experience and an extra bonus of fun.
The new modes make the game even better with open world feel and a good PVP experience for everyone the looting in the game has great impact on my soul!

This game... 
It took my life.
I abandoned all my friends, family, even my job.
I couldnt stop playing.
Getting addicted to heroin was much easier than this.
From 1h per day to 2. Then 4. 8. Suddenly i waked up to open CS:GO, and closed it, to sleep.
Day by day.
More.
Now there is nothing.
Just the game.
Help
